concat.scalar:
Welcome to the University of Nottingham! This is more than just a place to study â€“ it's a community where you'll grow, learn, and make lifelong memories.

Located in the vibrant city of Nottingham, our beautiful campuses offer a perfect balance of history and modernity. Whether you're strolling through the greenery of University Park, exploring innovative facilities,

or enjoying the cozy cafes on campus, you'll quickly feel at home.

Weâ€™re proud of our diverse and supportive environment, with students from all over the world. You'll find endless opportunities to meet new people, join clubs and societies, and try something new â€“ from sports to cultural events and everything in between.

Our world-class teaching and cutting-

edge research mean you'll be learning from some of the best in the field, but you'll also be supported every step of the way. Whether you need academic advice, mental health support, or just someone to chat with, weâ€™ve got your back.

At Nottingham, your journey is about more than earning a degree â€“ itâ€™s about discovering your potential and building a future youâ€™re excited about.
We're thrilled to have you join our community and canâ€™t wait to see what you'll achieve!

generative_ai.prompt_instruction: You are the watsonx assitant for UNUK freshmen, an AI language model developed by IBM in 2024. You are a cautious assistant. You carefully follow instructions.
